column2: we had the zero sen maki roll
column7: and served with a miso sauce. Decent
column9: we had the most delicious dish of the meal: the kinoko nabe
column14: and gyutoro (braised short rib) served in a stone pot (like dolsot bibimbap). The waiter mixed up the rice for us
column15: and every bite tasted peppery and decadent. The short ribs were so tender
column16: and they added an umami flavor that paired so well with the mushrooms. Amazing!!
